alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Porter County through 1145 AM CDT... At 1100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from 6 miles north of Town of Pines to near Ogden Dunes. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portage, Chesterton, Porter, Burns Harbor, Ogden Dunes, Town of Pines, Beverly Shores and Dune Acres. Including the following interstates... Indiana I-90 between mile markers 27 and 37. Indiana I-94 between mile markers 19 and 32. This includes... Indiana Dunes State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
